Detailed Description

The TLightKit class provides a kit with a transform, a light, a shape and a sunshape to represents the sun light.

The TLightKit structure: 

  CLASS TLightKit
  -->"this"
        "callbackList"
  -->   "transformGroup"
  -->      "transform"
  -->      "light"
  -->      "iconSeparator"
  -->         "icon"
  -->      "tsunshape"

Detailed information on catalog parts: 

  CLASS TLightKit
  PVT   "this",  TLightKit  ---
        "callbackList",  SoNodeKitListPart [ SoCallback, SoEventCallback ]
  PVT   "transformGroup",  SoTransformSeparator  ---
        "transform",  SoTransform  ---
        "light",  SoLight  --- , (default type = SoDirectionalLight)
  PVT   "iconSeparator",  SoSeparator  ---
        "icon",  SoNode  --- , (default type = SoCube)
        "tsunshape",  TSunShape  --- , (default type = TDefaultSunShape)

Member Function Documentation

void TLightKit::ChangePosition ( double  newAzimuth,
double  newZenith,
double  newDistance 
)

Changes the light position to azimuth, zenith, and distance from the scene centre. Azimuth and Zenith are in radians.

See also:
redo().

void TLightKit::ChangePosition ( QDateTime  newTime,
double  longitude,
double  latitude 
)

Computes the sun position local coordinates for the longitude and latitude in the newTime. The light is positioned at these coordinates. longitude and latitude are in degrees.

void TLightKit::GetPositionData ( QDateTime *  time,
double *  longitude,
double *  latitude 
)

Returns local time at time, zenith, and the localization longitue and latitude. longitude and latitude are in degrees.

See also:
ChangePosition()

Initializates TLightKit componets
